## If your landlord is harassing you ##

Call the police if you are being harassed or made to feel unsafe in your home.

## Allow time for your landlord to get back to you ##

Your landlord should get back to you within a reasonable amount of time. This can be anything from XX days for an emergency, to XX weeks for something less serious. 

If you haven't heard back from your landlord, you should try and contact them again. Remember to keep copies of any messages you send, along with the dates you sent them.

## Make a complaint about your landlord or letting agent ##

You could also consider making a complaint about your landlord or letting agent.  See [https://england.shelter.org.uk/housing_advice/private_renting/complaints_about_letting_agents](https://england.shelter.org.uk/housing_advice/private_renting/complaints_about_letting_agents)
